  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1089</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1089</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Los Riscal: lazos familiares</string>
            <string language="en">The Riscals: family ties</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Riscals: Familie Gleichheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Riscals : cravates de famille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Riscals: laços da família</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Riscals: legami della famiglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Riscals: οικογενειακοί δεσμοί</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) que exercita el camp semàntic del parentiu en llengua castellana. Es presenten uns personatges interrelacionats amb la finalitat d'estudiar la terminologia pròpia del camp semàntic familiar. L'alumnat disposa de seccions per autoavaluar-se, practicar, imprimir o sol·licitar més ajut.</string>
            <string language="en">Mini teaching unit (MUD) on the lexical field of kinship in Spanish. We are introduced to the members of an extended family with the aim of studying the words which define the relationship between the different people. The unit includes sections for self-assessment, practice, printing and asking for further help.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material interactiu</string>
            <string language="en">interactive material</string>
            <string language="es">material interactivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="es">lenguaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llenguatge especialitzat</string>
            <string language="en">language for special purposes</string>
            <string language="es">lenguaje especializado</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf dem 
lexikalischen fangen von der Verwandtschaft auf spanisch auf.
Wir werden zu den Bauteilen einer ausgedehnten Familie mit dem 
Ziel des Studierens der Wörter eingeführt, die das Verhältnis 
zwischen den unterschiedlichen Leuten definieren. Die 
Maßeinheit schließt Kapitel für Selbstbewertung, die Praxis ein und
druckt und bittet um weitere Hilfe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement (BOUE) sur la zone 
lexicologique de la parenté dans l'Espagnol. Nous sommes 
présentés aux membres d'un famille étendu dans le but d'étudier 
les mots qui définissent le rapport entre les personnes différentes.
L'unité inclut des sections pour art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, pratique,
imprimant et demandant davantage d'aide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini (LAMA) no campo lexical do
kinship no espanhol. Nós somos introduzidos aos membros de uma 
família prolongada com o alvo de estudar as palavras que definem o 
relacionamento entre os povos diferentes. A unidade inclui 
seções para o self-assessment, prática, imprimindo e pedindo ajuda 
mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione (FANGO) sul campo del 
lessico del kinship nello Spagnolo. Siamo introdotti ai membri 
di una famiglia estesa allo scopo di studiare le parole che 
definiscono il rapporto fra la gente differente. L'unità 
include le sezioni per la valutazione di se stesso, pratica, stampante
e chiedente ulteriore aiuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στο λεξικολογικό 
πεδίο της συγγένειας στα ισπανικά. Εισαγόμαστε στα μέλη 
μιας εκτεταμένης οικογένειας με το στόχο τις λέξεις που 
καθορίζουν τη σχέση μεταξύ των διαφορετικών ανθρώπων. Η 
μονάδα περιλαμβάνει τα τμήματα της αυτοαξιολόγησης, της 
πρακτικής, της εκτύπωσης και της ζήτησης τις περαιτέρω οδηγίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktives Material</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fachsprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel interactif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage pour des buts spéciaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">material interativo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua para finalidades especiais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiale interattivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio per gli scopi speciali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα για ειδικούς λόγους</string>
          </keyword>
